name: Magazine Mobile UI Kit
description:
Magazine UI Kit, created with components and variants.


The project is a redesign for a local magazine, but it's completely open source, both design and code.

The Desktop Kit is currently in the works, will be available soon. :D


Includes

  • Dark & Light Theme
  • Mobile Screens
  • Style guide
  • Responsive UI Components
  • Prototype


Tip. Go to both, light and dark screens, and have fun with the prototype.


Note. The components are made in english, but the screens are in spanish.
